title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unit shipments in millions, with a total of 15 data points.
Overall Unit shipments in millions has decreased over the Year.

Unit shipments in millions is roughly constant from 2005 to 2006, gradually decreasing from 2006 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Unit shipments in millions about 13.86 was recorded at Year 2005
Min Unit shipments in millions about 9.15 was recorded at Year 2013
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unit shipments in millions, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2005 to 2010.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2016.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
